overview.title: ¡Bienvenido a Manyverse!
overview.description: Las redes sociales pueden ser sencillas, neutrales, no comerciales, y basarse en la confianza entre amigos. Esto es lo que Manyverse representa, y esperamos que tú también puedas hacer que sea tu hogar digital. Todo esto es posible gracias al nuevo protocolo SSB.

description.1_normal: Manyverse puede usar una conección a internet, pero no está
description.3_normal: la Internet. Todo pasa aquí mismo en tu dispositivo. Esto significa que puedes usarlo normalmente aun cuando no estás en línea. Tu
description.4_bold: contenido se almacena primero en tu dispositivo
description.5_normal: , y puedes sincronizarlo con tus amigos una vez que te conectes con ellos.

ios.1_normal: Para conectarte con amigos y sincronizar contenido, puedes: unirte al mismo
ios.5_normal: . Para encontrar gente nueva en Internet, busca un código de invitación a un

default.1_normal: Para conectarte con amigos y sincronizar contenido, puedes: unirte al mismo
default.7_normal: . Para encontrar gente nueva en Internet, busca un código de invitación a un

description.1_normal: Debido a que tu dispositivo mantiene tu red social, nadie más puede bloquear o eliminar cuentas en tu nombre. Sólo tu puedes moderar tu espacio,
description.3_normal: que no quieres tener en tu dispositivo. Entonces, tus amigos pueden elegir bloquear esas mismas cuentas. Así es como la moderación puede propagarse naturalmente!

description.1_normal: Una vez que tu contenido se sincroniza con amigos, ellos ahora poseen una copia del mismo en sus dispositivos. Ya que podrían desconectarse después de eso, no es
description.3_normal: your content globally from all devices! This is why we have chosen to make content permanent. It also makes communities more respectful and considerate of what is being posted.

. We haven't figured everything out yet and some parts need fixing. While syncing, the app can appear frozen for several minutes. Have patience! Inform us of any other bugs you stumbled upon, and with enough time and donations, we can make this a great app.

setup_account.title: Es esta tu primera vez?
setup_account.description: Do you want to create a new account, or would you like to restore your old account from a 48-word recovery phrase?

central.building_indexes:
Creando índices de la base de datos...
Esto puede tardar varios minutos

empty.title: No hay mensajes
empty.description:
Escribe un diario para ser
compartido con tus amigos más tarde

empty.title: No hay conversaciones
empty.description:
Comienza una conversación privada
con cualquiera de tus amigos

offline.title: Desconectado
offline.description:
Activa el modo de conexión
o disfruta leyendo algún contenido existente

connecting.title: Conectando
connecting.description:
Espera mientras la aplicación
intenta conectar a tus peers

no_peers.title: No hay conexiones
no_peers.description:
Intenta sincronizar con personas cercanas
o usa un código de invitación al servidor

toasts.invite_rejected: Invitación rechazada. ¿Estás seguro de que es correcto?

staging.host: Internet P2P: esperando a un amigo en línea...
staging.client: Internet P2P: buscando a un amigo en línea...

bluetooth.title: Bluetooth
bluetooth.description: Descubre usuarios cercanos y conéctate con ellos mediante Bluetooth.

permission_request.title: ¿Permitir localizar a través de Bluetooth?
permission_request.message: Manyverse necesita usar Bluetooth para descubrir en dónde estás ("ubicación gruesa") y qué pares están a tu alrededor.

wifi.title: Wi-Fi
wifi.description: Connect with friends in the same Local Area Network, in other words, friends using the same Wi-Fi.

p2p.title: Internet P2P
p2p.description: Connect directly to friends currently online, using a peer-to-peer technology called "Distributed Hash Table".
p2p.connecting: Conectando a través de Internet P2P...
p2p.searching_friend: Currently searching for online friend who generated this invite code, to establish a data connection with them.
p2p.waiting_friend: Currently waiting for online friend to claim this invite code and establish a data connection.

servers.title: Servidores de Internet
servers.description: Connect to a so-called 'Pub server' owned by some friend, containing the latest data from multiple accounts.

accessibility_label.connected: Abrir pantalla de perfil para este peer conectado
accessibility_label.staged: Abrir la pantalla de perfil para esta conexión sugerida

follow_connect.label: Conectarse y seguir
follow_connect.accessibility_label: Conectarse a este peer sugerido y seguirlo

accessibility_label.peer: Desconectarse de este peer y eliminarlo de la base de datos
accessibility_label.room: Desconectarse de este room y eliminarlo de la base de datos
Eliminar este room de la base de datos

room_share_invite.label: Compartir código de invitación
room_share_invite.accessibility_label: Compartir el código de invitación para este room

invite_info.label: Acerca
invite_info.accessibility_label: Acerca de este código de invitación

invite_note.label: Agregar nota
invite_note.accessibility_label: Agregar nota de recordatorio para sí mismo

add.title: Agregar nota
add.description: Escribe una nota privada (sólo para ti mismo) sobre este código de invitación. Por ejemplo: "Esto es para Alicia"

p2p.title: Código de invitación de Manyverse
p2p.message: Connect with me on Manyverse by pasting this invite code there:
p2p.dialog_note: Give this invite code to one friend

room.title: Invite code to an SSB Room
room.message: Join me in the SSB Room {{name}} by pasting this invite code in Manyverse:
room.dialog_note: Give this invite code to a friend

content_warning.title: Content warning
content_warning.description: If your post contains sensitive topics, please add a short note to alert people of them.

image_caption.title: Caption
image_caption.description: Add some description of this picture, particularly for the visually impaired.

introduction.title:
Your account has
two parts to keep safe

description.1_normal: This is your account's posts, messages, pictures, likes and similar activity. To keep it safe against sudden loss, we use
description.5_normal: or other devices you own. There is
description.7_normal: , just use Manyverse often and your friends are backing you up!

description.1_normal: Your account's "fingerprint" is made up of a highly unique
description.3_normal: . This is a sequence of 48 words that unlocks your account.
description.5_normal: , because if anyone else has access to it, they can take control of your account.
description.7_normal: over it, since you and only you can recover your account!

notifications.new_conversation: This is a new private conversation

dialog_thanks.title: Thank you!
dialog_thanks.description:
Development of this app was supported by grants from {{sponsor1}} and {{sponsor2}}, and donations from:

**{{topBackers}}**, and [a hundred more backers]({{donateLink}}). Thanks!

sync_info.1_normal: You will sync when you are

libraries.title: Third party libraries
libraries.description: Manyverse makes use of the following open source libraries and components. We want to thank the authors of these libraries and link to their websites for proper attribution.

blocked.title: Blocked
blocked.description:
You have chosen to stop
interacting with this account

no_self_messages.title: No messages
no_self_messages.description:
Write a diary which you can
share with friends later

no_messages.title: No messages
no_messages.description:
You don't yet have any data
from this account

none_to_choose.title: No one
none_to_choose.description:
There is nobody in your
community with that name

practice.title: Practice
practice.header: Repeat it to confirm it is correct:

correct.title: Correct!
correct.description: Your account's identity is now secure because you know the recovery phrase.

incorrect.title: Incorrect
incorrect.description: Try again: write down your recovery phrase consisting of 48 words separated by whitespace.

correct.title: Welcome back!
correct.description:
Your account's identity is now restored.

Now, to restore your data, connect with friends that have interacted with you before, to redownload your data from them.

description.try_again: Try again by inserting your recovery phrase consisting of 48 words separated by whitespace.
description.overwrite_risk: There is already an account in the app, we cannot overwrite it. If you are sure you want to override, uninstall and re-install Manyverse to recover your account from a clean state.
description.too_short: There are some words missing. Your recovery phrase should be 48 words long.
description.too_long: There are too many words. Your recovery phrase should be exactly 48 words long.
description.wrong_length: Your recovery phrase should be exactly 48 words long.
description.generic: The recovery phrase you gave does not look like a valid identity generated by Manyverse.

header.1_normal: Carefully write down the following recovery phrase on a

show_follows.title: Show follow events
show_follows.subtitle: Show follow or block or unfollow cases on the public board
show_follows.accessibility_label: Toggle follow events on the public board

hops.title: Replication hops
hops.subtitle: How far out in the social graph should Manyverse download data; 1 is friends-only, 2 is friends-of-friends, etc. Caution: the higher this is, the more data is downloaded!

blobs_storage.title: Blobs storage limit
blobs_storage.subtitle: Automatically delete old images and blobs until they occupy at most this amount of storage on your device

restart_required.title: Restart required
restart_required.description: This setting will only enter into effect when you kill the app and restart Manyverse.

missing.title: Missing data
missing.description:
You don't yet have data
for the message known by the ID

blocked.title: Blocked thread
blocked.description:
You have chosen to block
the author of this thread

incompatible.title: Sorry
incompatible.description:
This app doesn't know how to process
and display this thread correctly
